content: Phase 1: Install dependencies and extend app-store with component state
Phase 1: Extend AG-UI Protocol v2 and create new API endpoints
Phase 2: Build crypto-charts component with ApexCharts and Material Design
Phase 2: Create linked-chart with chart-table synchronization
Phase 3: Build enhanced-button with trading actions and confirmations
Phase 3: Create auto-form with dynamic Zod schema generation
Phase 4: Build fancy-area with @mention support for agent communication
Phase 4: Create image-upload and file-uploader components
Phase 5: Build big-calendar with trading event scheduling
Phase 5: Final integration testing and documentation
